title.en: Biographies of Lu Zhonglian and Zou Yang
title.raw: 《魯仲連鄒陽列傳》 Biographies of Lu Zhonglian and Zou Yang

sentences.zh: 魯仲連者，齊人也。

translations.literal: Lu Zhonglian was Qi person.
translations.idiomatic: Lu Zhonglian was a native of Qi.

sentences.zh: 好奇偉俶儻之畫策，而不肯仕宦任職，好持高節。

translations.literal: Loved grand extraordinary outstanding strategies, yet not willing serve in office hold position, liked maintain high integrity.
translations.idiomatic: He loved grand and extraordinary strategies but refused to serve in office or hold positions, preferring to maintain his high integrity.

sentences.zh: 游於趙。

translations.literal: Traveled in Zhao.
translations.idiomatic: He traveled in Zhao.

translations.literal: Ru Zhonglian was a man of Qi. He delighted in strange, extraordinary, and unconventional strategies, but refused to take office or hold position, preferring to maintain lofty principles. He traveled in Zhao.

sentences.zh: 趙孝成王時，而秦王使白起破趙長平之軍前後四十餘萬，秦兵遂東圍邯鄲。

translations.literal: Zhao Xiao Cheng Wang time, yet Qin king sent Bai Qi broke Zhao Changping army before and after forty plus ten thousand, Qin troops thus east surrounded Handan.
translations.idiomatic: During King Xiao Cheng of Zhao's reign, the Qin king sent Bai Qi to defeat Zhao's army at Changping, killing over 400,000 men before and after. Qin troops then advanced east to surround Handan.

sentences.zh: 趙王恐，諸侯之救兵莫敢擊秦軍。

translations.literal: Zhao king feared, feudal lords rescue troops none dared attack Qin army.
translations.idiomatic: The Zhao king was terrified, and none of the feudal lords' rescue troops dared to attack the Qin army.

sentences.zh: 魏安釐王使將軍晉鄙救趙，畏秦，止於蕩陰不進。

translations.literal: Wei An Li Wang sent general Jin Bi save Zhao, feared Qin, stopped at Dangyin not advance.
translations.idiomatic: King An Li of Wei sent General Jin Bi to save Zhao, but he feared Qin and halted at Dangyin without advancing.

sentences.zh: 魏王使客將軍新垣衍閒入邯鄲，因平原君謂趙王曰：「秦所為急圍趙者，前與齊湣王爭彊為帝，已而復歸帝；

translations.literal: Wei king sent guest general Xin Yuanyan secretly enter Handan, through Lord Pingyuan told Zhao king said: 'Qin what urgently besieges Zhao, previously with Qi Min Wang contended strength became emperor, soon after again returned emperor;
translations.idiomatic: The Wei king sent his guest general Xin Yuanyan to secretly enter Handan. Through Lord Pingyuan he told the Zhao king: 'The reason Qin is urgently besieging Zhao is that previously Qin contended with King Min of Qi to become emperor, but soon returned the title;

sentences.zh: 今齊［湣王］已益弱，方今唯秦雄天下，此非必貪邯鄲，其意欲復求為帝。

translations.literal: Now Qi Min Wang already increasingly weak, present time only Qin heroic world, this not necessarily greedy Handan, its intent wishes again seek become emperor.
translations.idiomatic: Now that King Min of Qi has grown even weaker, Qin alone dominates the world today. This siege is not necessarily about coveting Handan; their real intention is to seek the title of emperor again.'

sentences.zh: 趙誠發使尊秦昭王為帝，秦必喜，罷兵去。」

translations.literal: Zhao sincerely sends envoy honors Qin Zhao Wang as emperor, Qin certainly happy, stops troops leaves.'
translations.idiomatic: If Zhao sincerely sends an envoy to honor King Zhao of Qin as emperor, Qin will certainly be pleased and withdraw their troops.'

sentences.zh: 平原君猶預未有所決。

translations.literal: Lord Pingyuan still hesitant not yet had decision.
translations.idiomatic: Lord Pingyuan was still hesitant and had not yet made a decision.

translations.literal: During Zhao King Xiaocheng's time, Qin king sent Bai Qi to break Zhao's Changping army, forty plus ten thousand before and after, Qin troops then east besieged Handan. Zhao king feared, feudal lords' rescue troops none dared attack Qin army. Wei King Anli sent general Xin Bi rescue Zhao, feared Qin, stopped at Dangyin not advancing. Wei king sent guest general Xin Yuanjian enter Handan secretly, through Lord Pingyuan told Zhao king: 'Qin does this urgently besieging Zhao, previously with Qi Min Wang contended for supremacy to become emperor, afterward again returned emperor title; Now Qi Min Wang already increasingly weak, presently only Qin heroic in world, this not necessarily greedy Handan, its intent wishes again seek to become emperor. Zhao truly sends envoy honor Qin Zhao Wang as emperor, Qin must pleased, withdraw troops depart.' Lord Pingyuan hesitated not yet decided.

sentences.zh: 此時魯仲連適游趙，會秦圍趙，聞魏將欲令趙尊秦為帝，乃見平原君曰：「事將柰何？」

translations.literal: This time Lu Zhonglian just happened traveled Zhao, met Qin besieges Zhao, heard Wei will want make Zhao honor Qin as emperor, then saw Lord Pingyuan said: 'Affair will how?'
translations.idiomatic: At this time, Lu Zhonglian happened to be traveling in Zhao. He encountered the Qin siege of Zhao and heard that Wei wanted to make Zhao honor Qin as emperor. He then met with Lord Pingyuan and said: 'What shall be done about this matter?'

sentences.zh: 平原君曰：「勝也何敢言事！

translations.literal: Lord Pingyuan said: 'I dare not speak about affairs!
translations.idiomatic: Lord Pingyuan said: 'How dare I speak about affairs!

sentences.zh: 前亡四十萬之眾於外，今又內圍邯鄲而不能去。

translations.literal: Previously lost four hundred thousand multitude outside, now again internally besieges Handan yet cannot leave.
translations.idiomatic: Previously we lost 400,000 troops in the field, and now Handan is besieged internally and we cannot drive them away.

sentences.zh: 魏王使客將軍新垣衍令趙帝秦，今其人在是。

translations.literal: Wei king sent guest general Xin Yuanyan make Zhao emperor Qin, now that person is here.
translations.idiomatic: The Wei king sent his guest general Xin Yuanyan to make Zhao honor Qin as emperor, and now that man is here.

sentences.zh: 勝也何敢言事！」

translations.literal: I dare not speak about affairs!'
translations.idiomatic: How dare I speak about affairs!'

sentences.zh: 魯仲連曰：「吾始以君為天下之賢公子也，吾乃今然後知君非天下之賢公子也。

translations.literal: Lu Zhonglian said: 'I began considering you world's worthy noble son, I only now then know you not world's worthy noble son.
translations.idiomatic: Lu Zhonglian said: 'I initially considered you one of the world's worthy nobles. Only now do I realize you are not one of the world's worthy nobles.

sentences.zh: 梁客新垣衍安在？

translations.literal: Wei guest Xin Yuanyan where is?
translations.idiomatic: Where is Wei's guest Xin Yuanyan?

sentences.zh: 吾請為君責而歸之。」

translations.literal: I request for you blame and send him away.'
translations.idiomatic: I request to blame him on your behalf and send him away.'

sentences.zh: 平原君曰：「勝請為紹介而見之於先生。」

translations.literal: Lord Pingyuan said: 'I request to introduce and present him to the master.'
translations.idiomatic: Lord Pingyuan said: 'I request to introduce him and present him to you, Master.'

sentences.zh: 平原君遂見新垣衍曰：「東國有魯仲連先生者，今其人在此，勝請為紹介，交之於將軍。」

translations.literal: Lord Pingyuan then saw Xin Yuanyan said: 'Eastern state has Lu Zhonglian master, now that person here, I request introduce, make him acquainted with general.'
translations.idiomatic: Lord Pingyuan then met with Xin Yuanyan and said: 'From the eastern states there is Master Lu Zhonglian. He is here now, and I request to introduce him and have him make your acquaintance, General.'

sentences.zh: 新垣衍曰：「吾聞魯仲連先生，齊國之高士也。

translations.literal: Xin Yuanyan said: 'I heard Lu Zhonglian master, Qi state's noble scholar.
translations.idiomatic: Xin Yuanyan said: 'I have heard of Master Lu Zhonglian, Qi's noble scholar.

sentences.zh: 衍人臣也，使事有職，吾不願見魯仲連先生。」

translations.literal: Yan subject person, mission affairs have duty, I not wish see Lu Zhonglian master.'
translations.idiomatic: I am a subject on a mission with duties. I do not wish to see Master Lu Zhonglian.'

sentences.zh: 平原君曰：「勝既已泄之矣。」

translations.literal: Lord Pingyuan said: 'I have already revealed it.'
translations.idiomatic: Lord Pingyuan said: 'I have already let it slip.'

sentences.zh: 新垣衍許諾。

translations.literal: Xin Yuanyan agreed.
translations.idiomatic: Xin Yuanyan agreed.

translations.literal: At this time Ru Zhonglian just traveled Zhao, met Qin besieging Zhao, heard Wei will want make Zhao honor Qin as emperor, then saw Lord Pingyuan said: 'Affair will handle how?' Lord Pingyuan said: 'Sheng how dare speak affairs! Before lost forty thousand multitudes outside, now again inner besieging Handan cannot depart. Wei king sent guest general Xin Yuanjian make Zhao emperor Qin, now that person is here. Sheng how dare speak affairs!' Ru Zhonglian said: 'I began considering lord world worthy noble son, now then I know lord not world worthy noble son. Wei guest Xin Yuanjian where? I request for lord blame and return him.' Lord Pingyuan said: 'Sheng request introduce see mister.' Lord Pingyuan then saw Xin Yuanjian said: 'East state has Ru Zhonglian mister, now that person here, Sheng request introduce, make him befriend general.' Xin Yuanjian said: 'I heard Ru Zhonglian mister, Qi state's lofty scholar. Yuanjian subject minister, mission has duty, I not wish see Ru Zhonglian mister.' Lord Pingyuan said: 'Sheng already revealed it.' Xin Yuanjian permitted promised.

sentences.zh: 魯連見新垣衍而無言。

translations.literal: Lu Lian saw Xin Yuanyan yet without words.
translations.idiomatic: Lu Zhonglian met Xin Yuanyan but said nothing.

sentences.zh: 新垣衍曰：「吾視居此圍城之中者，皆有求於平原君者也；

translations.literal: Xin Yuanyan said: 'I see those dwelling in this besieged city middle, all have requests from Lord Pingyuan;
translations.idiomatic: Xin Yuanyan said: 'I see that those living in this besieged city all have requests of Lord Pingyuan;

sentences.zh: 今吾觀先生之玉貌，非有求於平原君者也，曷為久居此圍城之中而不去？」

translations.literal: Now I observe master's jade appearance, not have request from Lord Pingyuan, why long dwell this besieged city middle not leave?'
translations.idiomatic: Now I observe your noble appearance, Master - you seem to have no request of Lord Pingyuan. Why do you remain so long in this besieged city without leaving?'

sentences.zh: 魯仲連曰：「世以鮑焦為無從頌而死者，皆非也。

translations.literal: Lu Zhonglian said: 'World considers Bao Jiao as without followers eulogy died, all wrong.
translations.idiomatic: Lu Zhonglian said: 'The world considers Bao Jiao to have died because he had no followers or eulogists. This is all wrong.

sentences.zh: 眾人不知，則為一身。

translations.literal: Crowd not know, then for one person.
translations.idiomatic: If the crowd does not understand, then it is for oneself.

sentences.zh: 彼秦者，棄禮義而上首功之國也，權使其士，虜使其民。

translations.literal: That Qin, abandons rites righteousness and elevates head merit country, schemes makes its scholars, enslaves its people.
translations.idiomatic: That Qin is a country that abandons rites and righteousness to elevate beheading merits. It schemes to employ its scholars and enslaves its people.

sentences.zh: 彼即肆然而為帝，過而為政於天下，則連有蹈東海而死耳，吾不忍為之民也。

translations.literal: If they recklessly become emperor, moreover govern world, then Lian has step East Sea die only, I not bear be their people.
translations.idiomatic: If they recklessly become emperor and then govern the world, then I, Zhonglian, would only step into the East Sea and die. I cannot bear to be their subjects.

sentences.zh: 所為見將軍者，欲以助趙也。」

translations.literal: What for see general, wish with help Zhao.'
translations.idiomatic: The reason I wanted to see you, General, was to help Zhao.'

translations.literal: Ru Zhonglian saw Xin Yuanjian without words. Xin Yuanjian said: 'I see dwell this besieged city middle, all have requests of Lord Pingyuan; Now I observe mister jade appearance, not one with requests of Lord Pingyuan. Why stay long this besieged city middle without depart?' Ru Zhonglian said: 'World considers Bao Jiao no followers eulogy died, all not so. Crowd people not know, then for one body. That Qin, abandons ritual righteousness above merit country, authority makes its scholars, captive makes its people. If immediately arrogantly becomes emperor, passes to govern world, then Zhonglian has step East Sea die, I not bear be its people. What for see general, wishes assist Zhao.'

sentences.zh: 新垣衍曰：「先生助之將柰何？」

translations.literal: Xin Yuanyan said: 'Master help it how?'
translations.idiomatic: Xin Yuanyan said: 'How will you help them, Master?'

sentences.zh: 魯連曰：「吾將使梁及燕助之，齊、楚則固助之矣。」

translations.literal: Lu Lian said: 'I will make Wei and Yan help it, Qi, Chu then firmly help it.'
translations.idiomatic: Lu Zhonglian said: 'I will get Wei and Yan to help them. Qi and Chu will certainly help them as well.'

sentences.zh: 新垣衍曰：「燕則吾請以從矣；

translations.literal: Xin Yuanyan said: 'Yan then I request follow;
translations.idiomatic: Xin Yuanyan said: 'As for Yan, I can get them to follow;

sentences.zh: 若乃梁者，則吾乃梁人也，先生惡能使梁助之？」

translations.literal: As for Wei, then I am Wei person, master how can make Wei help it?'
translations.idiomatic: But as for Wei, I am from Wei myself. How can you, Master, get Wei to help them?'

sentences.zh: 魯連曰：「梁未睹秦稱帝之害故耳。

translations.literal: Lu Lian said: 'Wei not seen Qin call emperor harm reason only.
translations.idiomatic: Lu Zhonglian said: 'Wei has simply not yet seen the harm of Qin calling itself emperor.

sentences.zh: 使梁睹秦稱帝之害，則必助趙矣。」

translations.literal: Make Wei see Qin call emperor harm, then certainly help Zhao.'
translations.idiomatic: If Wei sees the harm of Qin calling itself emperor, then it will certainly help Zhao.'

translations.literal: Xin Yuanjian said: 'Mister assist how?' Ru Zhonglian said: 'I will make Wei and Yan assist it, Qi, Chu then certainly assist.' Xin Yuanjian said: 'Yan then I request follow; If Wei, then I am Wei person, mister how can make Wei assist?' Ru Zhonglian said: 'Wei not yet seen Qin called emperor harm therefore. Make Wei see Qin called emperor harm, then must assist Zhao.'

sentences.zh: 新垣衍曰：「秦稱帝之害何如？」

translations.literal: Xin Yuanyan said: 'Qin call emperor harm how?'
translations.idiomatic: Xin Yuanyan said: 'What is the harm of Qin calling itself emperor?'

sentences.zh: 魯連曰：「昔者齊威王嘗為仁義矣，率天下諸侯而朝周。

translations.literal: Lu Lian said: 'Formerly Qi Wei Wang once practiced benevolence righteousness, led world feudal lords pay homage Zhou.
translations.idiomatic: Lu Zhonglian said: 'In the past, King Wei of Qi once practiced benevolence and righteousness. He led all the feudal lords in paying homage to Zhou.

sentences.zh: 周貧且微，諸侯莫朝，而齊獨朝之。

translations.literal: Zhou poor and weak, feudal lords none pay homage, yet Qi alone pay homage it.
translations.idiomatic: Zhou was poor and weak. No feudal lords paid homage, but Qi alone honored it.

sentences.zh: 居歲餘，周烈王崩，齊後往，周怒，赴於齊曰：『天崩地坼，天子下席。

translations.literal: Stayed year plus, Zhou Lie Wang died, Qi late go, Zhou angry, announced to Qi said: 'Heaven collapse earth split, Son of Heaven descend mat.
translations.idiomatic: Over a year later, King Lie of Zhou died. Qi arrived late for the mourning. Zhou was angry and announced to Qi: 'Heaven has collapsed and earth split. The Son of Heaven has descended from his mat.

sentences.zh: 東藩之臣因齊後至，則斮。』

translations.literal: Eastern vassal minister because Qi late arrive, then decapitate.'
translations.idiomatic: The eastern vassal minister arrived late because of Qi, so decapitate him.'

sentences.zh: 齊威王勃然怒曰：『叱嗟，而母婢也！』

translations.literal: Qi Wei Wang suddenly angry said: 'Scold, your mother female slave!'
translations.idiomatic: King Wei of Qi suddenly grew angry and said: 'Damn you! Your mother is a slave girl!'

sentences.zh: 卒為天下笑。

translations.literal: Finally became world laugh.
translations.idiomatic: He finally became the laughingstock of the world.

sentences.zh: 故生則朝周，死則叱之，誠不忍其求也。

translations.literal: Therefore alive then pay homage Zhou, dead then rebuke it, truly not bear its requests.
translations.idiomatic: Therefore while alive they honored Zhou, but when dead they rebuked it. Truly they could not bear its demands.

sentences.zh: 彼天子固然，其無足怪。」

translations.literal: That Son of Heaven as such, it not worth strange.'
translations.idiomatic: The Son of Heaven acts like this - it's not worth being surprised about.'

translations.literal: Xin Yuanjian said: 'Qin called emperor harm how?' Ru Zhonglian said: 'Formerly Qi Wei Wang once did benevolence righteousness, led world feudal lords court Zhou. Zhou poor and small, feudal lords none court, Qi alone court it. Dwell year plus, Zhou Lie Wang collapsed, Qi later went, Zhou angered, announced Qi: 'Heaven collapse earth split, emperor descends mat. East fief ministers because Qi late arrive, then behead.' Qi Wei Wang suddenly angered said: 'Scold, your mother concubine!' Finally became world laugh. Thus alive then court Zhou, dead then scold it, truly not bear its demands. That emperor certainly so, its nothing strange.'

sentences.zh: 新垣衍曰：「先生獨不見夫仆乎？

translations.literal: Xin Yuanyan said: 'Master alone not see that servant?
translations.idiomatic: Xin Yuanyan said: 'Master, have you not seen servants?

sentences.zh: 十人而從一人者，寧力不勝而智不若邪？

translations.literal: Ten people yet follow one person, rather strength not win yet wisdom not match?
translations.idiomatic: When ten people follow one, is it because their strength cannot overcome him or their wisdom cannot match him?

sentences.zh: 畏之也。」

translations.literal: Fear him.'
translations.idiomatic: They fear him.'

sentences.zh: 魯仲連曰：「嗚呼！

translations.literal: Lu Zhonglian said: 'Alas!
translations.idiomatic: Lu Zhonglian said: 'Alas!

sentences.zh: 梁之比於秦若仆邪？」

translations.literal: Wei compared to Qin like servant?'
translations.idiomatic: Is Wei compared to Qin like a servant?'

sentences.zh: 新垣衍曰：「然。」

translations.literal: Xin Yuanyan said: 'Yes.'
translations.idiomatic: Xin Yuanyan said: 'Yes.'

sentences.zh: 魯仲連曰：「吾將使秦王烹醢梁王。」

translations.literal: Lu Zhonglian said: 'I will make Qin king boil mince Wei king.'
translations.idiomatic: Lu Zhonglian said: 'I will make the Qin king boil and mince the Wei king.'

sentences.zh: 新垣衍怏然不悅，曰：「噫嘻，亦太甚矣先生之言也！

translations.literal: Xin Yuanyan discontentedly displeased, said: 'Alas, also too excessive master words!
translations.idiomatic: Xin Yuanyan was discontentedly displeased and said: 'Alas, your words are too excessive, Master!

sentences.zh: 先生又惡能使秦王烹醢梁王？」

translations.literal: Master moreover how can make Qin king boil mince Wei king?'
translations.idiomatic: Moreover, Master, how can you make the Qin king boil and mince the Wei king?'

sentences.zh: 魯仲魯曰：「固也，吾將言之。

translations.literal: Lu Zhonglian said: 'Certainly, I will speak of it.
translations.idiomatic: Lu Zhonglian said: 'Certainly, I will speak of it.

sentences.zh: 昔者九侯、鄂侯、文王，紂之三公也。

translations.literal: Formerly Jiu Hou, E Hou, Wen Wang, Zhou three ducal ministers.
translations.idiomatic: In the past, Jiu Hou, E Hou, and Wen Wang were King Zhou's three ducal ministers.

sentences.zh: 九侯有子而好，獻之於紂，紂以為惡，醢九侯。

translations.literal: Jiu Hou had daughter beautiful, offered to Zhou, Zhou considered ugly, made mincemeat Jiu Hou.
translations.idiomatic: Jiu Hou had a beautiful daughter whom he offered to King Zhou. King Zhou considered her ugly and had Jiu Hou made into mincemeat.

sentences.zh: 鄂侯爭之彊，辯之疾，故脯鄂侯。

translations.literal: E Hou argued strongly, debated fiercely, therefore dried meat E Hou.
translations.idiomatic: E Hou argued strongly and debated fiercely, so King Zhou had E Hou made into dried meat.

sentences.zh: 文王聞之，喟然而嘆，故拘之牖里之庫百日，欲令之死。

translations.literal: Wen Wang heard this, sighed deeply, therefore imprisoned him Youli prison hundred days, wished make him die.
translations.idiomatic: When Wen Wang heard this, he sighed deeply. Therefore he imprisoned King Zhou in the Youli prison for a hundred days, hoping to make him die.

sentences.zh: 曷為與人俱稱王，卒就脯醢之地？

translations.literal: Why with people together call king, finally go to dried meat mincemeat place?
translations.idiomatic: Why call himself king together with others, only to end up in the place of dried meat and mincemeat?

sentences.zh: 齊湣王之魯，夷維子為執策而從，謂魯人曰：『子將何以待吾君？』

translations.literal: Qi Min Wang to Lu, Yi Wei Zi as held whip followed, told Lu people said: 'You will how treat my lord?'
translations.idiomatic: When King Min of Qi went to Lu, Yi Wei Zi held the whip and followed, telling the Lu people: 'How will you treat my lord?'

sentences.zh: 魯人曰：『吾將以十太牢待子之君。』

translations.literal: Lu people said: 'I will with ten great sacrificial animals treat your lord.'
translations.idiomatic: The Lu people said: 'We will treat your lord with ten great sacrificial animals.'

sentences.zh: 夷維子曰：『子安取禮而來［待］吾君？

translations.literal: Yi Wei Zi said: 'You why take rites come treat my lord?
translations.idiomatic: Yi Wei Zi said: 'Why do you come with such rites to treat my lord?

sentences.zh: 彼吾君者，天子也。

translations.literal: That my lord, Son of Heaven.
translations.idiomatic: My lord is the Son of Heaven.

sentences.zh: 天子巡狩，諸侯辟舍，納筦籥，攝衽抱機，視膳於堂下，天子已食，乃退而聽朝也。』

translations.literal: Son of Heaven tours inspect, feudal lords clear residence, submit keys tallies, hold up hem embrace shuttle, view meals at hall below, Son of Heaven finished eating, then retreat listen court.'
translations.idiomatic: When the Son of Heaven tours and inspects, feudal lords clear their residences, submit keys and tallies, hold up their hems and embrace shuttles, view meals below the hall. After the Son of Heaven finishes eating, they retreat and listen to court.'

sentences.zh: 魯人投其籥，不果納。

translations.literal: Lu people threw their tallies, not finally submit.
translations.idiomatic: The Lu people threw down their tallies and refused to submit.

sentences.zh: 不得入於魯，將之薛，假途於鄒。

translations.literal: Could not enter Lu, led to Xue, borrowed road from Zou.
translations.idiomatic: Unable to enter Lu, he led his entourage to Xue, borrowing the road through Zou.

sentences.zh: 當是時，鄒君死，湣王欲入弔，夷維子謂鄒之孤曰：『天子弔，主人必將倍殯棺，設北面於南方，然後天子南面弔也。』

translations.literal: At this time, Zou lord died, Min Wang wished enter condole, Yi Wei Zi told Zou orphan said: 'Son of Heaven condoles, host certainly will double funeral bier, set north face at south, then Son of Heaven south face condole.'
translations.idiomatic: At this time, the Zou lord died. King Min wished to enter and offer condolences. Yi Wei Zi told Zou's heir: 'When the Son of Heaven offers condolences, the host must double the funeral bier, set up a northern facing position in the south, then the Son of Heaven faces south to offer condolences.'

sentences.zh: 鄒之群臣曰：『必若此，吾將伏劍而死。』

translations.literal: Zou ministers said: 'If necessarily like this, we will prostrate sword die.'
translations.idiomatic: Zou's ministers said: 'If it must be like this, we will fall on our swords and die.'

sentences.zh: 固不敢入於鄒。

translations.literal: Firmly dared not enter Zou.
translations.idiomatic: He firmly dared not enter Zou.

sentences.zh: 鄒、魯之臣，生則不得事養，死則不得賻襚，然且欲行天子之禮於鄒、魯，鄒、魯之臣不果納。
